About Us

Guaranteed quality

We provide our clients with high-tech solutions in the field of turnkey communications and information technology: equipment placement in the data center.

Cloud cloud services based on the infrastructure of our data centers,network design and construction,supply of equipment and materials,provision of communication services,technical operation and support.

Learn more
For our customers
flexibility
We provide at least three solutions to the problem and suggest choosing the most suitable one for the client. We also help to solve any: even the most non-standard tasks
Long-term relationships
We use all our experience and qualifications to solve business problems and work for the future. Therefore, customers who have chosen our servers stay with us for a long time
High-quality equipment
Uninterrupted access to the equipment located in the data center is provided through redundant high-speed data transmission channels with a bandwidth of up to 10 GB.
The safety
data center are protected by an automatic gas fire extinguishing system designed for early detection of a fire source, issuing a fire alarm and automatic extinguishing.
Technical support
technical support services for small, medium and large businesses wishing to develop their resource. Our team is committed to helping customers solve any issues and is focused on providing high-quality technical support services.

Solutions

Managed
Kubernetes
Use fault-tolerant and autoscaled Kubernetes clusters with guaranteed availability in the Selectel cloud. Simplify the process of deploying, scaling, and maintaining container infrastructure.
Learn more
Servers
with GPU
Cloud and physical servers with graphics cards for 3D modeling, rendering, machine learning and complex analytics.
Learn more
Administration
of services
We help clients to ensure stable operation of services and web applications. We are implementing modern development methodologies, optimizing databases
Learn more
Private
Cloud
We will build a completely isolated cloud based on our own developments — on our infrastructure or on-premise. We will provide full engineering support 24/7.
Learn more
Object
Storage
Store data for the operation of services and their backups, analytics data and datasets for ML. We will provide instant scaling and replication.
Learn more
